Text: Only you would know DR_Brooklyn, your so loose, you could shove a Freightliner up yours.

1. the show it`s good.
2. actors are actors and that`s all! not gay/straight
MATT BOMER = GAY BOTTOM *the ANAL FUCKER*
Matt Bomer's  asshole must be quite loose one so many staff are going in and out

You guys *do* know that only men who are insecure in their own masculinity feel the need to make crude gay slurs -- or any gay slur, for that matter.   You're so afraid that you might be attracted -- or are attracted -- to other men that you feel the need to act out like an 8-year old.  How sad for you that you feel you have to deny what you are and cut down those who are smarter and more talented than you are in order to feel like a man.  You poor, poor things.

You know, most towns and cities have free or low-cost mental health clinics.  You really should go talk to someone about this problem of yours.  You don't have to worry that someone will find out you're a latent homosexual -- counselors don't gossip.  But please, get some help.  It must be hell living in your mind.
